attributes.action: Sir David Nicholson be stripped of his knighthood in light of Morcombe Bay Scandal and others
attributes.additional_details:
In light of the Morecombe  Bay and Mid Staffs scandals Sir David Nicholson should be stripped of his knighthood

Fred Goodwin was in charge of money this was lives lost
Sharon Shoesmith lost everything due to one toddlers life

Sauce for the goose sauce for the gander
